General.Name: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance services in Thailand. It offers hire-purchase and loan, and non-performing assets management services. The company also invests in other companies; and provides management and consulting services for retail credit systems in local and foreign countries, as well as credit sale in foreign countries. In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
